long_description: Keep the Dansko Sam Tooled Shoes in rotation from spring to fall with their closed-toe, open-heel design. Soft full-grain leather and Dansko comfort ensure your feet are happy during long, busy days. Dri-lex(R)-wrapped footbeds manage moisture. Beveled heels provide great stability at impact. Shock-absorbing foam midsole means all-day comfort; nylon shanks are built-in for added support and stability. EVA inserts provide additional cushioning where you need it most. Long-wearing durable polyurethane outsoles provide shock absorption, flexibility and energy return. Dansko Sam Shoes carry the Seal of Acceptance from the APMA (American Podiatric Medical Association).
short_description: Keep the Dansko Sam Tooled Shoes in rotation from spring to fall with their closed-toe, open-heel design. Soft full-grain leather and Dansko comfort ensure your feet are happy during long, busy days.
